actions.name: Ethereal Shroud
actions.description: Effect: The user gains the resistances and immunities of the Ghost-Type (but not the type itself, so the user does not receive STAB on Ghost attacks, nor the weaknesses of the Ghost-Type), and is affected by Gloomy Weather as if it were Ghost-Type. The user takes 25% less damage from Special-Category Attacks.
